ComicInfo.Series: The Mask: I Pledge Allegiance to the Mask
ComicInfo.Summary:
The bestselling comic series that inspired the blockbuster film returns with gruesome hilarity from the showrunner of AMC's Halt and Catch Fire and Hellboy's Patric Reynolds.
In the presidential debate of the century, a woman with a noble cause takes on a deranged, green-headed murderer who promises to provide every tax payer with as much high-tech weaponry as they can carry.
